entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
